moves.name: Behemoth Blade
moves.effect: This move’s power increases if the target has a sync buff.

moves.name: Move Gauge Boost
moves.effect: Increases the user’s move gauge by three.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Attack.

moves.name: Laser-Sharp Focus!
moves.effect: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one. Sharply raises the user’s Attack. Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit.

syncMove.name: Glorious Behemoth Blade
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases if the target has a sync buff.

passives.name: Fierce Entry 2
passives.description: Sharply raises the user’s Attack when the Pokémon enters a battle.

passives.name: Move Gauge Refresh 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.

passives.name: Sync Burst 1
passives.description: Restores one MP for the user when a sync move is used for the first time.
